product.title: Windsor Ivory - Roman Blind
product.description: A sweet and sumptuous blind, mixing contrasting feelings of purity and grandeur, the windsor ivory incorporates pale, luxurious white and blends it with a silky smooth, lightweight fabric, all falling together into the gentle curves of the roman style. Keep your bedroom light and airy, with a touch of luxe, by hanging the ivory amongst pale pink or mint green walls, and accenting throughout the room with a darker version of your chosen colour.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Valencia French Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru, whatever you call it, it's a very nice neutral shade that adds just enough colour to the window. This colourway is beautiful in both modern settings and homes that favour this valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee.

relproducts.title: Rimini Dove - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rich simplicity of the rimini in dove is all you need for any room. Neither dark nor light, it allows just a little light to penetrate, and provides you with the privacy you need, when you need it. And this resilient, quality blind will last you well, year upon year. There aren't many colours or styles that the moderating monochrome of the dove won't work with. Set off bright reds, complement deep purples, or tame dazzling limes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Almond - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini almond is a classic, creamy white offering that's sure to add a touch of elegance to any room. Its fine texture makes it soft to the touch, yet it retains the durability typical of the rimini range. Combine with bold patterns for effortless period chic, or with browns, beiges, and golds for a modern, opulent look. The almond's luxurious finish will particularly suit a living room or bedroom where relaxing is the main goal, but of course would work well in any room amongst most colour schemes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Cream - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: By embracing the simple things in life rimini cream brings you a little touch of luxury right where you need it as you craft your interiors to reflect who you really are. A delicately woven fabric plays host to the rich and calming nature of cream as your mind drifts off to your own personal oasis. Cream works in any room where you want to add that gentle homely touch that brings the rest of your decor together.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Smoke Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm smoke blue is a soft blue shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm smoke blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Dove Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm dove grey is a light soft grey shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm dove grey roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

relproducts.title: Genesis Plain Luxe Soft Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The genesis plain luxe cream offers a simple and stylish enhancement for your windows. This practical roller blind is designed with convenience in mind. Whatever room you hang this blind will also benefit from the dimout effect and uplifting cream colourway that will give the space a bright splash of warmth whatever time of day. Product id: db-rbx1947 fabric colour: soft cream material: 100% polyester lining: colour match polyester backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes genesis plain luxe soft cream roller blind in cream.

relproducts.title: Windsor Mist Grey Roman Blind
relproducts.description: The windsor mist grey roman blind provides a sophisticated way to style your windows with the practical benefits of a sleek and compact folding design. Marrying a silky feel fabric in a gentle grey hue with a glittering flowing pattern, this modern motif is sure to sparkle. This warm grey blind is a versatile choice that will team well with a range colours such as beige, gold, navy blue or lime green.

relproducts.title: Windsor Petal Pink Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Sleek and minimalist with a touch of sparkle, the windsor petal pink roman blind is a glamorous option for light control within your home and will suit a range of settings. Reflective, metallic yarns pick out an alluring pattern upon a silky feel, soft pink backdrop that will give your space a subtle touch of decorative pattern. Product id: db-rom1071 fabric colour: petal pink material: 41% cotton 36% polyester 23% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

relproducts.title: Windsor Canvas Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Made from silky-feel, neutral toned fabric and beautifully enriched with strands of metallic yarn, this window blind will make a simple yet sophisticated update for your decor. The windsor canvas roman blind features a lustrous and sparkling finish that is given further richness by the visual effect of the smooth curving pattern. Product id: db-rom1073 fabric colour: canvas material: 41% cotton 36% polyester 23% viscose lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

relproducts.title: Windsor Raspberry - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: In deep, pinky red, with the silky feel of deluxe satin, the windsor raspberry is a classic choice, adding plush homeliness and cosy luxury wherever it hangs. If ever there were a fabric made for the curves of the roman blind, this is the one. Try using the raspberry in a neutral cream or magnolia hallway to add a burst of colour to an often overlooked area of the home that can be much in need of a stylish lift.

relproducts.title: Windsor Taupe - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: In soft, subtle mocha brown, the windsor taupe is an elegant and sophisticated blind, combining a silky and satiny sheen to complement its pretty colour. Gently raised ribbing provides this otherwise sleek fabric with depth and texture, adding a characterful feel to the blind. The taupe will work beautifully as a delicate neutral to temper bolder colours. Try it with a wine and cream colour scheme, opted for a boldly printed wallpaper and rich, dark floors.

relproducts.title: Windsor Red - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Vivid and vibrant, the windsor red simply refuses to be missed. Its bold colour suits the soft sheen of the silk-like fabric perfectly, and the cloth is a lightweight yet highly durable one, backed with polycotton sateen lining for long-lasting protection. The red is one for the glamorous, so do it justice by pairing with rich golds for a strikingly eye-catching look that will make your home one of contemporary class.

relproducts.title: Windsor Sandstone - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: A gently shimmering pale gold, emphasised by the satin-feel fabric, the windsor sandstone is a blind of class and elegance. The silky cloth works wonderfully as a roman blind, easily falling into folds, and complementing the gentle curves. Craft a look of understated glamour in your living room by grouping the sandstone with cream walls and soft furnishings, wood-look tongue and groove flooring, and brushed gold oddments and accessories.

relproducts.title: Windsor Black - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: There's no black more striking than one with a deep, shimmering sheen, and that's what you get with the windsor in black. Raised ribbing catches the light further, increasing the feeling of texture and character to the blind. Use the black in a contemporary setting, teaming it with a boldly patterned wallpaper in shimmering silvers. Pick a sumptuous purple or a luxe forest green to use as your accents, placing them throughout the room in the form of cushions, lamps, and ornaments.

relproducts.title: Windsor White - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Pure and simple, the windsor white is the colour of snow, and adds a cool and refreshing vibe to the home without compromising on class or elegance. This light and pretty shade forms a beautiful roman blind, strengthened in appearance by the shimmering sheen of the silk-like fabric. The white can be paired with any colour combination you choose. It will look particularly attractive against a petrol blue shade to craft a contemporary nautical look in the bathroom.

relproducts.title: Lumiere Unlined Bijou Linen Grey Wash Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Bring your interiors together with ease with the lovely lumiere bijou linen grey wash roman blind. Its the perfect, modern neutral and can be easily styled with a range of rooms, from the bright and bold to monochrome schemes. The unlined fabric allows the light to softly s bring your interiors together with ease with the lovely lumiere bijou linen grey wash roman blind.

relproducts.title: Lumiere Unlined Bijou Linen Pear Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Give your favourite space a little refresh with the uplifting lumiere unlined bijou linen pear roman blind. Full of energy, this green roman blind will bring the outside in and combined with the subtle textured finish, it will breathe a new life into surrounding decor. Pl give your favourite space a little refresh with the uplifting lumiere unlined bijou linen pear roman blind.

relproducts.title: Lumiere Unlined Bijou Linen Grape Roman Blind
relproducts.description: A deep, luxurious red that effortlessly brings a glamorous vibe to interiors, the ombre bijou grape roman blind is truly captivating. Theres a lot to love about the stunning red roman blind, with the rich colour, textured finished and unlined fabric, it will complement a sche a deep, luxurious red that effortlessly brings a glamorous vibe to interiors, the ombre bijou grape roman blind is truly captivating.

relproducts.title: Lumiere Unlined Bijou Linen Duck Egg Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Fresh, calming and of course, stylish too, the lumiere bijou linen duck egg roman blind brings a touch of calm to interiors. The tranquil bluey green shade is perfect for spaces that need a soft touch of colour and is so easy to style with other schemes, from the bright and bo fresh, calming and of course, stylish too, the lumiere bijou linen duck egg roman blind brings a touch of calm to interiors.

This nautral cream cottonroman blind, introduces a dark cream/light brown shade to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting accessories. Add a touch of luxury to your home with their hand-made roman blinds. relproducts.title: Faux Suede Cream Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Simple yet stylish the cream faux suede roman blind is the perfect finish for both the traditional & contemporary interiors. Their faux suede collection comes in a variety of colours which complement various styles of home decoration. Its a perfect solution to creating a comfy space for you to relax in. The faux suede is soft to the touch, and is incredibly pleasing to the eye. All their blinds are made to measure right here in their west yorkshire factory.

relproducts.description: Urban comes in several modern grey and cream shades, this hopsack range adds modern simplicity to your kitchen or bedroom. Urban tales on a metallic appearance the light hits the fabric, adding more depth to this textured fabric. Their lightest shade in the urban range, urban cream brings a light and airy feel to your room. Combine with wooden accessories for a modern earthy finish. Their made to measure roman blinds are all handmade within the uk and will provide a touch of luxury to your interior styling.
